Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionSurprise>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> Link?!<sp:0:4:0>Are you alone? <sp:5:0:0>Wh-<sp:5:0:0>where's
<clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><snd:SurpriseM_01>Oh, never mind! You'd better go talk to
Purah right away!<sp:0:4:0>I think she's in the <clr:0000>research lab<clr:ffff>. That's
the <clr:0000>building with a telescope<clr:ffff>!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionSurprise_01>Oh!<sp:5:1:0> Link?!<sp:0:4:0>It really is you!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I heard you'd returned. I...wanted to
come see for myself, but I couldn't bring
myself to bother you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Are you leaving for now?
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Word has it that <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff> up north
is going through a terrible cold snap.<sp:0:4:0>I'm talking the kind of <clr:0000>freezing
temperatures <clr:ffff>that <clr:0000>sap your strength<clr:ffff>
in the blink of an eye.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_00>So if you go there, you may want to bring
foods or elixirs that will warm you up.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionSurprise_01>Huh? <sp:5:1:0>L-L-<sp:5:0:0>Link?!<sp:0:4:0>Is that really you?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I heard you had returned, but, well, I was
too shy to try talking to you... <sp:5:1:0>Oh!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Link, sir! You're in the newspaper!<sp:0:4:0>The shadowy hero who pulled Rito Village
from the brink of oblivion...<sp:0:4:0>Kiimo over in the <clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>
reads the <clr:0000>newspaper <clr:ffff>every single day.
He showed me the article.
Now the whole world knows how amazing
you are!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>I read about what happened at
Gerudo Town!<sp:0:4:0>Kiimo, who's always reading the
<clr:0000>newspaper<clr:ffff> at the <clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>,
showed me the article.
If anyone was going to wipe out those
monsters, of course it'd be you.<sp:0:4:0>So that's why the Gerudo are here.
They're repaying what you did.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>I never thought I'd see the day we stood
shoulder to shoulder with the Gerudo.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionSurprise>Y-<sp:5:0:0>you really shouldn't be talking to me...
Go find <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>I think she's in the <clr:0000>research lab<clr:ffff>. That's
located in the <clr:0000>building with the telescope<clr:ffff>!
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>Sir, you're back!<sp:0:4:0>Did you hear the latest? It sounds like
Princess Zelda might be in Hyrule Castle.

I don't usually put stock in rumors, but
this one I really hope is true.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionSurprise>Hurry now! Go talk to <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>! She's in
the <clr:0000>building with the telescope<clr:ffff>!
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand>I hear a terrible cold snap has hit
<clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff> in the northwest.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're going that way, you may want to
bring foods or elixirs that'll warm you up.
BlackZelda_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've been so worried about the princess.
Even if it's just a rumor, hearing she
might be OK set my mind at ease a little.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>The question now is...<sp:5:0:0>where is she?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I love reading about your adventures in
the newspaper!<sp:0:4:0>My buddy Kiimo, in the <clr:0000>emergency
shelter<clr:ffff>? He and I love to talk about all
the cool, heroic things you do.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>And I mean, you're the reason that we
can stand shoulder to shoulder with
Gerudo warriors.
With so much skill concentrated in
one spot, it's only a matter of time
before we find Princess Zelda!
BlackZelda_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Take this with a grain of salt, but there's a
rumor Princess Zelda is in Hyrule Castle.

Again, that's just a rumor, but I really do
hope it's true.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Evening! You're not working, are
you? Why not take it easy and read
the <clr:0000>newspaper<clr:ffff>?
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Nice night. You're not working, are
you? Why not take it easy and read
the <clr:0000>newspaper<clr:ffff>?
Talk_00: <sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionSurprise_01>Link, sir? Is that you?<sp:0:4:0>It is, isn't it?!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Wh-where have you been?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>On rainy days like this, I like to kick back
and read the <clr:0000>newspaper<clr:ffff>. You read today's
edition yet?
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble_01>After you and <clr:0000>Princess Zelda <clr:ffff>went to
the castle to investigate, it rose into
the sky.
We've all been so worried!


<clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> has been working day and night
here to find any sign of you!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_01>You're the reason that we can stand
shoulder to shoulder with proud
Gerudo warriors.
My buddy Kiimo, in the <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff>?
He and I can't wait to read in the
<clr:0000>newspaper <clr:ffff>about what you do next!
With you here, I've got a feeling it's
just a matter of time before we find
Princess Zelda.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>She's probably in that <clr:0000>building with
the telescope<clr:ffff> right now.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Please, go talk to her. She'll be relieved
to know you're all right.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The <clr:0000>newspaper<clr:ffff>'s great. It's like a curated
tour through everything that's happening
in the world.
Kiimo is over in the <clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>
reading it right now.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Sigh_00>I'm going to borrow today's paper as soon
as he's done, but he's taking forever.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>I've decided that when Princess Zelda
returns and our work is done, I'm going
to become a journalist.
Doesn't that sound like a nice job?
Traveling all over the world, finding
untold stories to tell?
I've been talking about that with my
buddy Kiimo. He's always in the
<clr:0000>emergency shelter <clr:ffff>reading the <clr:0000>paper<clr:ffff>.
